rule.name: CM_MI_AgeDebtPagingGrid
rule.description: Contains paging grid for age debt report
rule.definition:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField"( label:"", totalCount:ri!datasubset.totalCount, columns:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[1], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"CaseID",{}), links: apply( #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"( recordType: #"_a-0000da84-7ec2-8000-6ee0-010000010000_1432", identifier: _ ), index( ri!datasubset.data, "CaseID", {} ) ), field:"CaseID" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[2], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"TopClientName",{}), field:"TopClientName" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[3], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"BrandName",{}), field:"BrandName" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[4], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"ClientName",{}), field:"ClientName" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[5], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"ProductName",{}), field:"ProductName" ),
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[6], data:apply(#"_a-0000dac7-a419-8000-6ee0-010000010000_4596",index(ri!datasubset.data,"CaseManagerName",{})), field:"CaseManagerName" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[7], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"AmountTotal",{}), field:"AmountTotal" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[8], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"Days_1_30",{}), field:"Days_1_30" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[9], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"Days_31_60",{}), field:"Days_31_60" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[10], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"Days_61_90",{}), field:"Days_61_90" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[11], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"Months_3_6",{}), field:"Months_3_6" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[12], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"Months_6_12",{}), field:"Months_6_12" ),
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[13], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"Months_12_18",{}), field:"Months_12_18" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[14], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"Months_18_24",{}), field:"Months_18_24" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[15], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"Months_24_30",{}), field:"Months_24_30" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label:#"_a-0000db6d-e203-8000-6ee0-010000010000_26687"[16], data:index(ri!datasubset.data,"Months_30",{}), field:"Months_30" ) }, value:ri!pagingInfo, saveInto:ri!pagingInfo )
